name: Schatten4810.github.com
body:
## Maven

* Archetype for DBFlute

1. Generate

```
mvn archetype:generate -DarchetypeCatalog=http://schatten4810.github.com/maven 
```

1. Create DBFlute Client

```
cd <created artifactId>
mvn compile 
```
